TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void FormViewInsertEventHandler(object sender, FormViewInsertEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed FormViewInsertEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub FormViewInsertEventHandler(sender As Object, e As FormViewInsertEventArgs)
public delegate void FormViewInsertEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, FormViewInsertEventArgs ^ e);
type FormViewInsertEventHandler = delegate of obj * FormViewInsertEventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: Objeto que contiene los datos del evento.

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: Representa el método que controla el evento de un control .

span.span: Represents the method that handles the event of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El control provoca la eventos cuando un botón Insertar (un botón con su `CommandName` propiedad establecida en "Insert") dentro del control se hace clic en, pero antes la control inserta el registro.The control raises the event when an Insert button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Insert") within the control is clicked, but before the control inserts the record. Esto le permite proporcionar un método de control de eventos que realiza una rutina personalizada, como codificación HTML o validación de los valores de un registro antes de insertarlo en el origen de datos, cada vez que se produce este evento.This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as HTML encoding or validating the values of a record before inserting it in the data source, whenever this event occurs. Cuando se crea un delegado , se identifica el método que controlará el evento.When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. Para asociar el evento al controlador, se debe agregar una instancia del delegado al evento.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. Siempre que se produce el evento, se llama a su controlador, a menos que se quite el delegado.The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. Para obtener más información sobre los delegados de controlador de eventos, consulte [controlar y provocar eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo agregar mediante programación un delegar en el eventos de un control.The following example demonstrates how to programmatically add a delegate to the event of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewInsertedEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventHandler/CS/formviewinsertedeventhandlercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewInsertedEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventHandler/VB/formviewinsertedeventhandlervb.aspx#1)] En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo agregar mediante declaración una delegar en el eventos de un control.The following example demonstrates how to declaratively add a delegate to the event of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewInsertEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertEventArgs/CS/formviewinserteventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewInsertEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertEventArgs/VB/formviewinserteventargsvb.aspx#1)]
